amendatorysection.para: In any action brought pursuant to the Uniform Civil Remedies for Unauthorized Disclosure of Intimate Images Act, a plaintiff may request to use a pseudonym instead of his or her legal name in all court proceedings and records. Upon finding that the use of a pseudonym is proper, the court shall ensure that the pseudonym is used in all court proceedings and records.

crossreference.para: Uniform Civil Remedies for Unauthorized Disclosure of Intimate Images Act, see section 25-3501.
